page.title: 17ST.MARY'S STEAMSHIP CO.
page.content: More Communications In a year the Scillonian will travel twenty one thousand six hundred miles,by crossing over to the islands and back.She has three life-boats,one on one side and two on the other.She has twenty eight life rafts which can carry twenty five people each.She has two radar and three Marconi radios.She has two bow thrusters which will push off one point seven tonnes of water each. There is also a sky bus that comes regularly each week.The sky bus can take up to one ton of cargo.It can carry up to nine people.It flies from St Just Airport,her maximum speed is 135 knots.The sky bus uses 26 gallons of fuel per hour,it would cost one adult Â£17 50p and one child Â£8 50p for a single.
